member.summary: Returns the name of an assembly object that contains storage assets

member.name: M:IGExtensions.Common.Data.DataStorageProvider.GetStorageAbsolutePath(System.Boolean)
member.summary:
Returns storage absolute path for all assets such as xml, mdb, and images files based on CurrentCulture
Use this method to get access to assets that are copied to output directory

member.name: M:IGExtensions.Common.Data.DataStorageProvider.LocalizePath(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Returns localized storage path for all assets such as xml, mdb, and images files

member.name: M:IGExtensions.Common.Data.DataStorageProvider.GetStorageLocalPath(System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary:
Returns storage component path for all assets such as xml, mdb, and images files based on CurrentCulture
Use this method to get access to assets that are built as resources in the .Assets assembly

member.name: M:IGExtensions.Common.Data.DataStorageProvider.GetStorageShapefilesPath
member.summary: Returns the localized full path for all shapefile assets

member.summary: Returns the localized full path for all CSV assets

member.name: M:IGExtensions.Common.Data.DataStorageProvider.GetStorageCsvPath(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the localized full path for a given CSV asset
